comment:
* An interface to provide a non-activity window.
 * Examples are {@link WindowContext} and {@link WindowProviderService}.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: int getWindowType()
methods.comment: Gets the window type of this provider

methods.name: Bundle getWindowContextOptions()
methods.comment: Gets the launch options of this provider

methods.name: IBinder getWindowContextToken()
methods.comment:
* Gets the WindowContextToken of this provider.
     * @see android.content.Context#getWindowContextToken
